summary: ENGINE FAILURE WHILE DRIVING.  I HAVE MADE COMPLAINTS TO CHEVROLET CUSTOMER ASSISTANCE REGARDING THE ENGINE FAILURE ON OUR 3/4 TON DIESEL TRUCK AND UNTIL THE TRUCK IS IN ENGINE FAILURE THE MECHANIC CANNOT DETERMINE THE CAUSE.  MEAN WHILE I WAS TOLD  UNTIL THE COMPUTER CAN DETERMINE THE CAUSE, NOTHING CAN BE DONE.  *JB
